tasks.task: Construct a compost bin using pallets and wire.
subtasks: Obtain pallets from a building supplier.
Stand pallets up on either end and in the middle for three bins.
Use bailing wire to secure the pallets together.
Loop wire through the pallet holes, twist tight, and secure with pliers or nippers.
Cut off loose ends and smooth with pliers.
Repeat for all four pallets and both top and bottom.
Ensure bins are stable and secure for composting.

tasks.task: MAINTASK: Construct a wire compost bin using pallets.
subtasks: Obtain pallets from a supplier.
Arrange two pallets vertically at each end and one in the middle, forming three bins.
Thread bailing wire through the pallet holes to interlock the frames.
Twist the wire tightly and trim any excess with pliers.
Repeat the process for the top and bottom layers of pallets.
Verify that the bins are stable and secure.

MAINTASK: Assemble a three-bin composting system from pallets.

Assemble a compost bin using pallets.
subtasks: Stack two pallets vertically at the ends and one in the middle, ensuring each section is stable.
Use bailing wire to bind the pallets together, looping through the holes and tightening securely.
Trim and flatten the ends of the wire to prevent sharp edges.
Repeat the wiring process on the top and bottom of each pallet section for added reinforcement.

subtasks: Wire the pallets).
